channel.title: Dsl on The Working R Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Dsl on The Working R Programmer

item.title: Evaluating dynprog expressions
item.description: I think I now have a complete implementation of the dynamic programming DSL I wrote about the other day. You can install it from the GitHub repository if you want to experiment with it.

item.title: Designing a DSL for dynamic programming
item.description: I’m working on an example for one of the chapters of Domain Specific Languages in R that will appear in the printed version but weren’t included in the earlier e-book. The plan is to have one to three extra example chapters, depending on how much I can do before my deadline on April 1st.
